name: Solid Oak Bench with Backrest – PI -140 cm

specifications.rawSpecificationsHTML: The PI Series Solid Oak Bench with Backrest offers both aesthetic appeal and practical functionality with its modern design and comfortable structure. Handcrafted entirely from solid oak wood, this spacious modern solid oak bench is made from natural materials, ensuring that each piece is unique with its own distinct wood grain and texture. Designed to enhance comfort with its backrest, this bench is perfect for use alongside dining tables, in living rooms, or seating areas. The warmth of natural wood meets refined details, creating a timeless style. A water-based matte varnish applied to the surface provides protection against daily wear, scratches, and stains, ensuring long-lasting durability. The PI Series Minimalist Solid Oak Backrest Bench is an ideal choice for those seeking both functionality and elegance, making it a perfect seating solution for any contemporary space.
